You need to be using HTTPS to place a sc: You need to be using HTTPS to place a screen-sharing call.
You can use the custom server options to: You can use the custom server options to sign into other Matrix servers by specifying a different homeserver URL. This allows you to use Riot with an existing Matrix account on a different homeserver.
You can also set a custom identity serve: You can also set a custom identity server, but you won't be able to invite users by email address, or be invited by email address yourself.

Lots of rooms already exist in Matrix, l: Lots of rooms already exist in Matrix, linked to existing networks (Slack, IRC, Gitter etc) or independent. Check out the directory!
